50#ifndef AM_HAL_RSTGEN_H
51#define AM_HAL_RSTGEN_H
52
53#ifdef __cplusplus
54extern "C"
55{
56#endif
57
58//*****************************************************************************
59//
60// RESET specific definitions.
61//
62//*****************************************************************************
63//**************************************
64//
66//
67//**************************************
68typedef enum
69{
70 AM_HAL_RESET_BROWNOUT_HIGH_ENABLE,
71 AM_HAL_RESET_WDT_RESET_ENABLE,
72 AM_HAL_RESET_SECURE_WDT_ENABLE,
73 AM_HAL_RESET_BROWNOUT_HIGH_DISABLE,
74 AM_HAL_RESET_WDT_RESET_DISABLE,
75 AM_HAL_RESET_SECURE_WDT_DISABLE
76} am_hal_reset_configure_e;
77
78//**************************************
79//
81//
82//**************************************
83typedef enum
84{
85 AM_HAL_RESET_CONTROL_SWPOR,
86 AM_HAL_RESET_CONTROL_SWPOI,
87} am_hal_reset_control_e;
88
89//**************************************
90//
92//
93//**************************************
94typedef enum
95{
96 AM_HAL_RESET_STATUS_EXTERNAL = RSTGEN_STAT_EXRSTAT_Msk,
97 AM_HAL_RESET_STATUS_POA = RSTGEN_STAT_POASTAT_Msk,
98 AM_HAL_RESET_STATUS_BOD = RSTGEN_STAT_BORSTAT_Msk,
99 AM_HAL_RESET_STATUS_SWPOR = RSTGEN_STAT_SWRSTAT_Msk,
100 AM_HAL_RESET_STATUS_SWPOI = RSTGEN_STAT_POIRSTAT_Msk,
101 AM_HAL_RESET_STATUS_DEBUGGER = RSTGEN_STAT_DBGRSTAT_Msk,
102 AM_HAL_RESET_STATUS_WDT = RSTGEN_STAT_WDRSTAT_Msk,
103 AM_HAL_RESET_STATUS_BOUNREG = RSTGEN_STAT_BOUSTAT_Msk,
104 AM_HAL_RESET_STATUS_BOCORE = RSTGEN_STAT_BOCSTAT_Msk,
105 AM_HAL_RESET_STATUS_BOMEM = RSTGEN_STAT_BOFSTAT_Msk,
106 AM_HAL_RESET_STATUS_BOHPMEM = RSTGEN_STAT_BOSSTAT_Msk,
107 AM_HAL_RESET_STATUS_AIRCR = RSTGEN_STAT_AIRCRSTAT_Msk,
108 AM_HAL_RESET_STATUS_SECURE_WDR = RSTGEN_STAT_SECUREWDRSTAT_Msk,
109 AM_HAL_RESET_STATUS_CM4_TIMEOUT = RSTGEN_STAT_CM4TIMEOUTSTAT_Msk
110} am_hal_reset_status_e;
111
112#define AM_HAL_RESET_STATUS_MASK 0x1FFF
113
114//**************************************
115//
117//
118//**************************************
119typedef struct
120{
121 am_hal_reset_status_e
122 eStatus; // Return all status bits from RSTGEN.STAT
123 bool bEXTStat; // External reset
124 bool bPOAStat; // Power-On reset
125 bool bBODStat; // Brown-Out reset
126 bool bSWPORStat; // SW Power-On reset
127 bool bSWPOIStat; // SW Power On Initialization reset
128 bool bDBGRStat; // Debugger reset
129 bool bWDTStat; // Watch Dog Timer reset
130 bool bBOUnregStat; // Unregulated Supply Brownout event
131 bool bBOCOREStat; // Core Regulator Brownout event
132 bool bBOMEMStat; // Memory Regulator Brownout event
133 bool bBOHPMEMStat; // High power Memory Regulator Brownout event
134 bool bAIRCRStat; // AIRCR SYSRESETREQ
135 bool bSecureWdtRst; // Reset was initiated by a Watchdog Timer ResetReset was initiated by a Watchdog Timer Reset
136 bool bCM4TimeoutStat; // CM4 timeout (AXI quiescence timout from CM4)
137} am_hal_reset_status_t;
138

141//
142#define AM_HAL_RESET_INTERRUPT_BODH RSTGEN_INTEN_BODH_Msk
143
144// Global variable used to capture the reset status
145extern uint32_t gAmHalResetStatus;
